critique: The executive order is focused on national security and amending previous orders related to subversive organizations. The primary emotions the president likely wants to convey are a sense of seriousness and vigilance regarding potential threats to national security. Fear and disgust might be relevant due to the nature of the organizations being addressed, but the order aims to project an image of control and resolve rather than inciting panic or strong aversion. Surprise and joy are not relevant in this context.
